name: Collect! Dodge! Collide!
description:
you play as an ice cream ball.

omg, what are those obstacles, how random.

do what the ui says, idk either

you decide if it is buggy or not

use A and D (or Left and Right arrow keys) to go... left and right.

use SPACE to... jump

and use S or (the Down arrow key) to go down sometimes... a bug?! no, what are you talking about? it's a feature, part of the challenge

also... Q to quit playing.

note: this was for the #icecreamjam

but dumb 'ol me forgot how to upload the build to itch.io

then i was looking on the wrong path...

and when i found the right path, i kept clicking 'upload file' instead of 'save'... with only like 10 seconds left

i mean, how fun, what a way to start my 20th year of life

no, i didn't cry afterwards, you did
